coloredTexts.text: The Backpack has hard quests, but their skins are totally worth it
I work alongside the butcher, but sometimes I think he's a bit weird.
This here, this there, and that's it! Some nice boots.
Leather is used for almost everything, you can even eat it!
There are other animals you can get leather from besides cows.
A great leather craft is not just a piece of leather. Itâ€™s a piece of art.
